Package de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded.DatabaseManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public final class DatabaseManager extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Controls database instances on a PostgreSQL server instances.

    EmbeddedPostgres
    getEmbeddedPostgres()
    Return the EmbeddedPostgres instance that manages the database server which holds all of the databases managed by this database manager.
    static DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager>
    multiDatabases()
    Creates a new DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> instance that will create a new database on each call to getDatabaseInfo().
    static DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager>
    singleDatabase()
    Creates a new DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> instance that will return a connection to the same database on each call to getDatabaseInfo().

    Start the database server and the machinery that will provide new database instances.

  • Method Details

    • multiDatabases

      @NonNull public static DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> multiDatabases()
      Creates a new DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> instance that will create a new database on each call to getDatabaseInfo().
      Returns:
      A builder instance.

    • singleDatabase

      @NonNull public static DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> singleDatabase()
      Creates a new DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> instance that will return a connection to the same database on each call to getDatabaseInfo().
      Returns:
      A builder instance.

    • start

      @NonNull public DatabaseManager start() throws IOException, SQLException
      Start the database server and the machinery that will provide new database instances.
      Returns:
      This object.
      Throws:
      IOException - The server could not be started.
      SQLException - A SQL problem occured while trying to initialize the database.

    • close

      public void close() throws Exception
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Throws:
      Exception

    • getDatabaseInfo

      @NonNull public DatabaseInfo getDatabaseInfo() throws SQLException
      Returns a DatabaseInfo instance that describes a database. If this database provider is in multi mode, every call to this method will return a new database instance. If it is in single mode, it will always return the same database instance.
      Returns:
      A DatabaseInfo instance. This is never null.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Any error that happened during the database creation is thrown here.

    • getEmbeddedPostgres

      @NonNull public EmbeddedPostgres getEmbeddedPostgres()
      Return the EmbeddedPostgres instance that manages the database server which holds all of the databases managed by this database manager.
      Returns:
      An EmbeddedPostgres instance. Never null.
